document.full_text: winnie byanyima, a senior director at the united nations development program in new york, was on her way to the airport to fly to the u.s. when her car was stopped by security forces.
document.title: africa: uganda: opposition leader's wife is briefly held
lines_and_colors: winnie byanyima, a senior director at the united nations development program in new york, was on her way to the airport to fly to the u.s. when her car was stopped by security forces.
